comment.body: I have no idea what was going on, OP seems to have been deleted. more information: https://snyk.io/blog/malicious-code-found-in-npm-package-event-stream

I made an updated gallery/manga viewer [1+Gallery](/1PGaLLNiadMzrmw6MMMnpZnskwFcdgZoS4/), some people have made new galleries for it as well, mostly porn ... as per usual. You can find the SFW ones on the hubs tab.
What do you mean with exploding images? lol

F

@SirLotaplot: No problem, sorry it took me so long. Let me know how far you're able to push it before it gets slow.

I added comment numbers to the gallery list just like the favs, added a crude button to view comments below the infobox and finally fixed the famed comment duplication bug (erroneous SQL query from the 0-gallery days).

Showing latest comments somewhere is a good idea. Could I ask you to make such requests on the Git Center page in the future, it's hard to keep track of things if they're on ZeroTalk, ZeroMe, ZeroMail, etc.
